info.name: Reversi
info.attribution:
The woodgrain image by David Robarts is available in the Rummy Tiles game on the VirtualTabletop public library.  It is available under CC BY-NC-SA 4.0.

The room design, library image, and other room elements are by RogerLipsett and are released to the Public Domain under CC0.

Othello is a registered trademark of Kabushiki Kaisha MegaHouse.

blankBoardRoutine.Note: This is the enterRoutine for the four central squares

thenRoutine.Note: This is no longer a valid move

enterRoutine.value: border-style:inset ; background:black ; border-radius:100% ; border: 3px solid white
border-style:inset ; background:white ; border-radius:100% ; border: 3px solid black

getAdjacentEmptiesRoutine.Note1: Finds adjacent empty square. For each one,
getAdjacentEmptiesRoutine.Note2: puts direction vector to [row, col] in its adj property.

getFlipIndicesRoutine.Note2: returns an array consisting of the tokens that would be flipped

getFlipIndicesRoutine.Note: Get board squares in this direction from [row,col].
getFlipIndicesRoutine.Note1: Stop when you reach edge of board, token of playerID's

thenRoutine.Note: Invalid move if we find empty square

elseRoutine.Note: If current player is token, done
elseRoutine.Note1: else other player is token, push and continue

getValidMovesRoutine.Note: Generates a list of valid [row,col] moves for `playerID`
getValidMovesRoutine.Note1: For each valid move, `flipnn` contains the
getValidMovesRoutine.Note2: list of tokens that will be flipped upon that move.

getValidMovesRoutine.Note: Set array of adjacent squares of other color to []
Set array of flips of other color to []
Set all squares to be invalid moves
Find squares with other player's token in them
Loop over each square in 'other', looking for empty
getValidMovesRoutine.Note1: squares. For each such square, add the direction vector
getValidMovesRoutine.Note2: [deltaRow,deltaCol] of the square in 'other' to its adj

getValidMovesRoutine.Note: For each square with a non-null adj property,
getValidMovesRoutine.Note1: get the flips from that square and store in the

moveDoneRoutine.Note: After player makes a move, switches players,
moveDoneRoutine.Note1: gets valid moves for next player,
moveDoneRoutine.Note2: makes UI changes to indicate valid drop locations

thenRoutine.Note: If no moves, call noMovesRoutine, which will either
thenRoutine.Note1: end the game or else issue message
thenRoutine.Note2: and then call MoveDone again to switch players back.

isValidSquareRoutine.Note: Given row and col, returns true if 0<=rol, col <=7

moveToSquareRoutine.Note1: Used to flip tiles and update properties after a token move.

thenRoutine: var css = 'transition:linear 0.5s;border-style:inset ; background:white ; border-radius:100% ; border : 3px solid black'
elseRoutine: var css = 'transition: linear 0.5s; border-style:inset ; background:black ; border-radius:100% ; border: 3px solid white'

message.css: background-color:burlywood; border-color:peru; border-width:5px; filter: drop-shadow(1px 2px 10px #000) !important;text-align:center; font-size:60px; color:red

resetHolder.css: background-color:burlywood; border-color: peru; border-width:5px; border-radius:45px; filter: drop-shadow(1px 2px 10px #000) !important

moveTokensToHoldersRoutine.Note: Move all tokens back to holders

resetBoardRoutine.Note: Record that all squares are empty and not surrounded, and
resetBoardRoutine.Note1: make sure squares don't have light green background

thenRoutine.Note: This branch is for Othello(R) rules

elseRoutine.Note: This branch is for reversi rules

v485.css: background-color:burlywood; border-color:peru; border-width:5px; filter: drop-shadow(1px 2px 10px #000) !important;text-align:center; color:black

OptionsList.css: background-color:burlywood; border-color:peru; border-width:5px; filter: drop-shadow(1px 2px 10px #000) !important;text-align:center; color:black
OptionsList.leftEnabledCSS: --wcMain:burlywood; --wcMainOH: #ce954b; border-color:black; border-width:2px; filter: drop-shadow(1px 2px 10px #000) !important; color:black;border-radius: 50% 0% 0% 50% / 100% 0% 0% 100% ; font-size:20pt
OptionsList.rightDisabledCSS: background-color:green; border-color:black; border-width:2px; filter: drop-shadow(1px 2px 10px #000) !important; color:black;border-radius: 0% 50% 50% 0% / 0% 100% 100% 0% ; font-size:20pt
OptionsList.rightEnabledCSS: --wcMain:burlywood; --wcMainOH: #ce954b; border-color:black; border-width:2px; filter: drop-shadow(1px 2px 10px #000) !important; color:black;border-radius: 0% 50% 50% 0% / 0% 100% 100% 0% ; font-size:20pt
OptionsList.rightSmallEnabledCSS: --wcMain:burlywood; --wcMainOH: #ce954b; border-color:black; border-width:2px; filter: drop-shadow(1px 2px 10px #000) !important; color:black;border-radius: 0% 50% 50% 0% / 0% 100% 100% 0% ; font-size:16pt
OptionsList.rightSmallDisabledCSS: background-color:green; border-color:black; border-width:2px; filter: drop-shadow(1px 2px 10px #000) !important; color:black;border-radius: 0% 50% 50% 0% / 0% 100% 100% 0% ; font-size:16pt
OptionsList.leftSmallEnabledCSS: --wcMain:burlywood; --wcMainOH: #ce954b; border-color:black; border-width:2px; filter: drop-shadow(1px 2px 10px #000) !important; color:black;border-radius: 50% 0% 0% 50% / 100% 0% 0% 100% ; font-size:16pt

OptionsClose.css: background: white; --wcFont: black; --wcFontOH:red; border-style: none; font-family:Arial

Reversi.css: --wcMain:burlywood; --wcMainOH: #ce954b; border-color:black; border-width:2px; filter: drop-shadow(1px 2px 10px #000) !important; color:black;border-radius: 0% 50% 50% 0% / 0% 100% 100% 0% ; font-size:20pt

centerOnly.css: --wcMain:burlywood; --wcMainOH: #ce954b; border-color:black; border-width:2px; filter: drop-shadow(1px 2px 10px #000) !important; color:black;border-radius: 50% 0% 0% 50% / 100% 0% 0% 100% ; font-size:16pt

flipOK.css: background-color:green; border-color:black; border-width:2px; filter: drop-shadow(1px 2px 10px #000) !important; color:black;border-radius: 0% 50% 50% 0% / 0% 100% 100% 0% ; font-size:16pt

showLegalMoves.css: --wcMain:burlywood; --wcMainOH: #ce954b; border-color:black; border-width:2px; filter: drop-shadow(1px 2px 10px #000) !important; color:black;border-radius: 50% 0% 0% 50% / 100% 0% 0% 100% ; font-size:20pt

noShowLegalMoves.css: background-color:green; border-color:black; border-width:2px; filter: drop-shadow(1px 2px 10px #000) !important; color:black;border-radius: 0% 50% 50% 0% / 0% 100% 100% 0% ; font-size:20pt

wntp.text:
Note: Changing options will
reset the game
